lessons.japanese: ナプキンを頂けますか。
lessons.indonesian: May I have a napkin, please?

lessons.japanese: ナプキンをたたんでそれぞれお皿のそばに置きなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Fold the napkins and put one by each plate.

lessons.japanese: ナプキンで唇をきれいにしなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Clean your lips with the napkin.

lessons.japanese: ナプキンがありません。
エミーはナプキンを半分に折りたたんだ。
lessons.indonesian: Emmy folded the napkin in half.

lessons.japanese: 膝の上にナプキンを広げなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Lay the napkin across your lap.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はずっとナプキンを織り続けた。
lessons.indonesian: She folded napkins all the way.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はずっとナプキンを織り続けた。
lessons.indonesian: The whole time she kept weaving the napkin.

lessons.japanese: 彼はあごの下にナプキンをはさみ込んだ。
lessons.indonesian: He tucked the napkin under his chin.

lessons.japanese: 生理用ナプキンはどこにありますか。
ナプキンを頂けますか。
lessons.indonesian: May I have a napkin, please?

lessons.japanese: ナプキンをたたんでそれぞれお皿のそばに置きなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Fold the napkins and put one by each plate.

lessons.japanese: ナプキンで唇をきれいにしなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Clean your lips with the napkin.
